feed.title: Track Awesome Minecraft Updates Daily

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on May 03, 2025
entry.content:
Websites / Wiki

  • MinecraftSearch ‚Äì MinecraftSearch is an unofficial Minecraft Wiki with better user navigation that focuses on crafting, enchanting, villager trades, loot tables and a lot more.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Mar 07, 2025
entry.content:
Websites / Archives

  • MCModArchive - Archives old, lost and forgotten Minecraft mods and related software. Various other mods and stuff can be found on the MCArchive Discord.
  • Eimer Archive - Archive with a focus on server software and plugins.
  • OmniArchive - Archives most Minecraft jars.
  • MCVersions - Archives various Minecraft jars.

entry.content:
Websites / Indexes

  • MCDOC - The Index of Minecraft Tools and Unlockers

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Jun 11, 2024
entry.content:
Softwares / Libraries

  • CraftLib (‚≠ê92) - Complete Kotlin / Java library for wrapping the entire Minecraft codebase, including protocol, NBT, schematics, chat and more.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Nov 18, 2023
entry.content:
Server Plugins / Building

  • LuckPerms - Manage permissions.
  • CoreProtect (‚≠ê829) - Log everything your players do. Literally 1984.

Softwares / Utilities

  • Amulet (‚≠ê2k) - Map viewer/editor.
  • NBTEditor (‚≠ê69) - Edit NBT from .dat files.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Sep 28, 2023
entry.content:
Websites / Wiki

  • Official Minecraft Wiki - Minecraft Wiki is a complete resource for Minecraft, including gameplay, blocks, crafting, updates, events, mods, running a server, and resource packs.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Aug 18, 2023
entry.content:
Shader Packs / Building

  • White Wolf Shader (‚≠ê0) - Shader pack for Bedrock Edition focused on improving your gameplay experience.

Softwares / Launchers

  • XMCL (‚≠ê986) - X Minecraft Launcher (XMCL) is a modern Minecraft launcher that lets you manage your massive resources like modpacks, resource packs, mods and shader packs.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Aug 13, 2023
entry.content:
Softwares / Launchers

  • Prism - A fork of MultiMC, capable of downloading modpacks and other resources directly from CurseForge and FTB.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Jun 20, 2023
entry.content:
Softwares / Servers

  • Legendary-Java-Minecraft-Geyser-Floodgate (‚≠ê190) - PaperMC server with out of the box Geyser and Floodgate support using docker.
  • minecraft-docker (‚≠ê4) - Fork of Legendary-Java-Minecraft-Geyser-Floodgate (‚≠ê190) that embeds a discord bot for easy starting and stopping of the server.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Feb 05, 2023

Softwares / Servers

  • Minestom - Lightweight from-scratch server implementation.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Dec 05, 2022
entry.content:
Server Plugins / Building

  • Connect - Open shared Minecraft network for advertising public and local host servers.

Softwares / Servers

  • Gate (‚≠ê797) - A high performance & paralleled Minecraft proxy written in Go.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Oct 24, 2022
entry.content:
Softwares / Servers

  • Cauldron - Formerly known as MCPC+. The original server implementing the Forge and Bukkit API.
  • Cloudburst/NukkitX/Nukkit - A Bedrock Edition Server providing support for plugins supporting the Nukkit API.
  • Docker-Minecraft (‚≠ê12k) - A self-hosted Minecraft server using Docker containers.
  • KCauldron - A server implementing the Forge and Bukkit API for 1.7.10.
  • Mohist - A server implementing the Forge and Bukkit API.
  • Paper - Miscellaneous patches for Spigot and BungeeCord providing better performance and more configuration options.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Oct 10, 2022
entry.content:
Mods / Technology

  • ComputerCraft - Adds computers based on Lua (5.2 and 5.3) into Minecraft.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Jul 11, 2022
entry.content:
Websites / Mod Libraries

  • Modrinth - Open source Minecraft mod library with powerful filtering.
  • CurseForge - The largest repository for Minecraft mods.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Feb 17, 2022
entry.content:
Resource Packs / Building

  • BetterVanillaBuilding - Adds loads of new blocks with connected textures in optifine.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Oct 04, 2021
entry.content:
Mods / Performance

  • OptiFabric - A Fabric mod to allow Optifine to run using Fabric loader.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Jun 21, 2021
entry.content:
Mods / Performance

  • Sodium (for Fabric) (‚≠ê5.2k) - A Fabric mod designed to improve frame rates and reduce micro-stutter.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Jun 18, 2021
entry.content:
Websites / Archives

  • Minecraft Archive Project - Huge archive containing Minecraft mods, worlds, resource packs and many other resources (even forum posts!).
  • CraftBukkit Archive - Archives many CraftBukkit versions.

Mod Loaders / Archives

  • Quilt - A powerful fork of the Fabric project.
  • Rift - A Mod Loader for 1.13-1.13.2 (even Snapshots).

Mods / Maps

  • VoxelMap - Formerly known as Zan's Minimap, providing basic map and radar functionality.

Mods / Utilities

  • WTHIT - Shows the block currently looked at (Newer version of Hwyla).
  • Hwyla - Shows the block currently looked at (Newer version of Waila).
  • WorldInfo - Shows the block currently looked at (Waila for Rift).
  • Waila - Shows the block currently looked at (The original Waila project).
  • Block Helper - Shows the block currently looked at (Legacy alternative of Waila for older Minecraft versions than 1.6).

Resource Packs / Building

  • BDCraft - Various comic-style resource and sound packs, even for many mods, Bedrock Edition, and Terraria!
  • LB Photo Realism Reload - Successor of the LB Photo Realism texture pack making Minecraft look more realistic.
  • Default Dark Mode - Dark Mode for the default Minecraft UIs!
  • Cyber Optics - Sci-Fi resource pack.
  • Soartex - Smooth resource pack with mod support.

Shader Packs / Building

  • Continuum - A realistic shader pack.
  • Chocapic13 - A realistic and configurable shader pack.
  • Sonic Ether - Pathracing and other realistic shader packs.
  • Sildur - Shader packs even implementing Minecraft 1.16's built-in API.
  • Potato - A very lightweight shader pack for older or restrained PCs.
  • ESBE 2G - A shader pack for Bedrock Edition.

Softwares / Servers

  • Glowstone - Formerly known as Spout and BukkitContrib. Spigot Server alternative written from scratch with performance similar to Paper.
  • Spigot - CraftBukkit's successor providing support for the Bukkit API.
  • Sponge - Minecraft Server providing support for the Sponge API and is extensible to the Forge API and Bukkit API.
  • Thermos - A server implementing the Forge and Bukkit API for 1.7.10.

Development / Launchers

  • Tabula - Minecraft Mod that faciliates creating 3D Models.
  • Mod Coder Pack - Tool for properly decompiling Minecraft.
  • BON 2 (‚≠ê185) - A rewrite of the Bearded Octo Nemesis project with support for ForgeGradle.
  • Bearded Octo Nemesis (‚≠ê128) - Tool for deobfuscating with support for SRG mappings and especially the Mod Coder Pack.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Jun 09, 2021
entry.content:
Softwares / Libraries

  • go-mcproto (‚≠ê49) - Minecraft server communication protocol implementation written in Go that allows you to program your own bots.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Jul 23, 2020
entry.content:
Softwares / Libraries

  • MCProtocolLib (‚≠ê827) - A simple library for communicating with a Minecraft client/server, written in Java.
  • node-minecraft-protocol (‚≠ê1.3k) - A NodeJS library to parse and serialize minecraft packets, plus authentication and encryption.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Jun 16, 2020
entry.content:
Softwares / Utilities

  • Amidst (‚≠ê2.2k) - Display an overview of a Minecraft world, without actually creating it.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Apr 12, 2020
entry.content:
Mods / Performance

  • BetterFps - BetterFps is a Minecraft mod that add a few performance improvements.

Mods / Items Management

  • Bibliocraft - Bibliocraft is a storage and organizational mod that began as a single bookcase and has expanded to so much more.
  • /dank/null - A storage mod of unreal proportions which nobody really gets. The max tier /dank/null object holds 54 slots of items which each can hold 2.14 billion items!

Mods / Technology

  • Thermal Foundation + Dynamics + Expansion - A server-friendly and content-rich blend of magic and technology! Title is three different mod names, but of the same series and usually played together.
  • Actually Additions - Actually Additions is a technology mod that adds various utilities like multitools, item magnets, atomic reconstructors and so on.
  • Draconic Evolution - One of the best tech mod there is, but really overpowered in the late game. Adds things like a Draconic Power Core which no one has been able to fill yet...
  • Ender IO - A large ender themed mod, that just adds lots of new fun things.
  • Galacticraft - A mod that adds rockets and new planets to explore. Expandable with addons.
  • OpenComputers - OpenComputers is a mod that adds computers and robots into the game, which can be programmed in Lua 5.3.
  • WarpDrive - Adds Star Trek and other franchise like ships, weapons, transporters and so on into the game. Also adds new planets (dimensions).

Mods / Farming And Food

  • AgriCraft - A mod that adds a more sophisticated crop system, like the ability to have genetic mutations and also adds more crops.
  • Bonsai Trees - Adds essentially mini tree farms which are one block big.
  • Ex Nihilo: Creatio - A great mod for skyblocks, it filters things like sand and gravel for useful resources like iron and diamond, compatible with lots of mods.

Mods / Energy

  • Extreme Reactors - Adds nuclear reactors with the fictional fuel 'yellorium'. A carry on of the original Big Reactors.
  • Zetta Industries - A mod which adds the main multiblock of a big battery.

Mods / Magic

  • AbyssalCraft - AbyssalCraft is a magic mod centered around exploration.
  • Astral Sorcery - This is a magic mod based on the stars, and harnessing the powers of starlight and the constellations.
  • Avaritia - Avaritia is a mod with a really long progression tree, but really overpowered in the late game. Its soul purpose is to drag the endgame gameplay to extreme lengths.
  • Blood Magic - This is a magic mod based on blood. Beware, you die a lot.

Mods / Utilities

  • Akashic Tome - A mod based on Morph-o-Tool, which mainly gives the ability to merge different mods' documentation books.
  • AppleSkin - This mod does not change any existing mechanics, but simply makes the existing hunger saturation and exhaustion levels visible in the default GUI.
  • Attribute Fixer - This mod fixes the attribute system in Minecraft which handles things like armour points, because many other mods are inadvertantly affected by a limit in this system.
  • Diet Hopper - This mod modifies the way Minecraft calculates the collision boxes of the hopper, so that you can access any visible blocks behind it.
  • FoamFix - Fixes various aspects of the Minecraft code, generally making the game faster.

Mods / General

  • ArmorPlus - This mod literally adds tons of armors to the game, and different ways of crafting them.
  • Baubles - This mod adds seven new slots to the player inventory which can be fitted with various items like amulets, belts, rings and so on added by other mods.

Mods / Exploration

  • Aroma1997's Dimensional World - This mod adds one extra dimension, with the intended purpose of mining, meaning the Overworld will not be filled up with things like Buildcraft quarry holes anymore etc.
  • Twilight Forest - Adds a new twilight forest dimension with new sturctures, bosses, and quests to complete.

Mods / Building

  • Carpenter's Blocks - This mod adds new blocks such as slants and corners which can be made to look like any other block in the game! Extremely useful for artistic builds. (For 1.12+ see BlockCraftery)
  • Chisel - This mod adds multiple new textures to lots of blocks in the game, adding a wide variety of textures. (For editing units smaller than blocks see Chisel and Bits.)
  • FAWE - Stands for Fast Async WorldEdit. Based upon WorldEdit, it is simply faster, and adds lots more tools (i.e. brushes) to work with.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Apr 10, 2020
entry.content:
Mod Loaders / Archives

  • Fabric - A lightweight, experimental modding toolchain for Minecraft.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Nov 06, 2019
entry.content:
Mods / Building

  • WorldEdit (‚≠ê3.3k) - WorldEdit is an open source in-game map editor available for Bukkit, Forge, MinecraftEdu, and many other platforms.

Server Plugins / Building

  • WorldGuard (‚≠ê875) - WorldGuard lets you and players guard areas of land against griefers and undesirables, as well as tweak and disable various gameplay features of Minecraft.
  • CraftBook (‚≠ê311) - CraftBook lets you create magically extending bridges, compact Redstone circuits, complex Minecart mechanics, and much more ‚Äî all without a client mod and fully customizable by the server.

Web Applications / Building

  • Blessing Skin Server (‚≠ê907) - A web application brings your custom skins back in offline Minecraft servers.
  • WorldEdit Golf - Challenge others in a competition to use WorldEdit in as few commands as possible.

Development / Launchers

  • SchematicWebViewer (‚≠ê67) - A JavaScript/TypeScript library for rendering and viewing Minecraft schematic files on the web.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Apr 30, 2019
entry.content:
Softwares / Utilities

  • Minecraft Command Science - Several Minecraft vanilla JSON generators.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Feb 26, 2019
entry.content:
Mod Loaders / Archives

  • RopeMC (‚≠ê8) - A lightweight, reflection based mod loader which aims to be user friendly and later version independent.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Jan 27, 2019
entry.content:
Mods / Technology

  • Railcraft (‚≠ê515) - Greatly expand and improve the Minecart system in Minecraft.

Mods / Utilities

  • TNTUtils (‚≠ê8) - More control over explosions in Minecraft.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Sep 04, 2018
entry.content:
Mods / Maps

  • Journey Map - Real-time mapping in game or in a web browser as you explore.

Mods / Items Management

  • Just Enough Items (JEI) - JEI is an item and recipe viewing mod for Minecraft, built from the ground up for stability and performance.

Mods / Technology

  • Tinkers Construct - Tinkers' Construct is a mod about putting tools together in a wide variety of ways, then modifying them until they turn into something else.
  • Immersive Engineering - Immersive Engineering is a tech mod with a certain charm, based on the ideas and concepts, and with most assets created by Damien Hazard.
  • Botania (‚≠ê1.4k) - Botania is a tech mod in essence. The theme is natural magic.

Mods / Energy

  • Applied Energistics 2 (‚≠ê1.6k) - A Minecraft Mod about Matter, Energy and using them to conquer the world.
  • RFTools - RFTools is a mod containing various tools that are related to RF (Redflux) or technology in general.

Mods / Farming And Food

  • Pam's HarvestCraft - Pam's HarvestCraft is a mod for Minecraft that currently adds many kinds of crops and food.

Server Plugins / Building

  • AntiCheatReloaded (‚≠ê105) - AntiCheatReloaded helps server admins easily identify and block malicious users by monitoring and analyzing the behaviour of their players.
  • ViaVersion (‚≠ê1.4k) - Allows the connection of newer clients to older server versions for Minecraft servers.
  • AdvancedKitsReloaded (‚≠ê10) - AdvancedKitsReloaded is a Kit managing plugin for Minecraft servers which runs Bukkit, CraftBukkit, Spigot and Paper (>1.8). With this plugin you can easily create/edit/delete your kits and you can customize it as much as you'd like.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Sep 03, 2018
entry.content:
Websites / Wiki

  • Chinese Minecraft Wiki - The Chinese Minecraft Wiki is an official wiki of Minecraft, covering detailed tutorials on crafting, blocks, creatures and even PE versions.
  • wiki.vg - Technical Minecraft wiki.

Mod Loaders / Archives

  • Meddle (‚≠ê31) - Everything related to modding 1.9/1.10 snapshots in one place.

Mods / Skins And Capes

  • Custom Skin Loader (‚≠ê551) - Custom Skin Loader for Minecraft.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on Aug 03, 2018
entry.content:
Softwares / Launchers

  • MultiMC (‚≠ê4.5k) - A custom launcher for Minecraft that allows you to easily manage multiple installations of Minecraft at once.
  • HMCL (‚≠ê7.8k) - A powered Minecraft launcher that supports a lot of features.

entry.title: Awesome Minecraft Updates on May 27, 2018
entry.content:
Websites / Forums

  • Minecraft Forums - Official community forums, a great place to talk about the game.
  • Planet Minecraft - Creative community fansite.

Mod Loaders / Archives

  • Minecraft Forge (‚≠ê7.2k) - Modifications to the Minecraft base files to assist in compatibility between mods.
  • liteloader - A lightweight mod loader for Minecraft designed to provide simple, high-performance and reliable loader functionality for mods which don't need to modify game mechanics.

Mods / Performance

  • Optifine - OptiFine is a Minecraft optimization mod.

Mods / Skins And Capes

  • Universal Skin Mod (‚≠ê26) - A Minecraft Forge Mod allows players load custom skin & cape textures.

Softwares / Utilities

  • Minecraft Command Helper (‚≠ê26) - A WPF Program about generate Minecraft Command (with NBT data). (Windows Only)

Development / Launchers

  • FML Mod Development Tutorial - (Chinese) Minecraft 1.8.9 FML Mod Development Tutorial.
